name: DROP NOT!
description:
DROP NOT! Reaction based arcade/puzzle tapper!
Tap to turn, beat the puzzles. Collect multipliers, run into teleports, unlock new characters and beat the handcrafted levels with variety of different themes!

Make your longest run and rise through the ranks on leaderboards! Drop or DROP NOT!

Features:
- Simple tap controls
- Change seamlessly between Landscape and Portrait mode
- 30+ unlockable characters
- Two game modes: Level mode & Endless mode
- 35 challenging handcrafted levels
- 5 unique graphical themes: Sky, Desert, Water, Night and Mechanical
- Original music
- GameCenter leaderboards and achievements
- iCloud saving
- ReplayKit recording supported
- iMessage Stickers
